description: A determined detective relentlessly pursues a brilliant art thief across continents.
Two ambitious co-workers vie for the same promotion, resorting to sabotage and corporate espionage.
A young queen must defend her throne from her treacherous uncle who believes he is the rightful heir.
Estranged siblings are forced to reunite and confront their painful past after inheriting their family's dilapidated estate.
A seasoned trial lawyer faces off against a cunning prosecutor in a high-stakes murder case.
A pacifist martial artist is challenged to a duel by a rival warrior seeking to prove his own superiority.
Lovers from two warring families must choose between their loyalties and their forbidden romance.
An accomplished surgeon develops a tremor in her hands and must overcome her identity crisis.
A soldier returning from war struggles with PTSD, alienating the family he fought to protect.
A recovering addict must confront their personal demons and temptations to stay sober for their child.
An aspiring musician with crippling stage fright must perform a solo to win a life-changing scholarship.
A reformed criminal is haunted by guilt and must decide whether to confess to a past crime to save an innocent person.
A devoutly religious person questions their faith after a personal tragedy shatters their worldview.
An ambitious politician must choose between their moral principles and a compromising deal that will ensure their election.
A lone astronaut is stranded on Mars and must use their ingenuity to survive the hostile environment.
A group of climbers is caught in a sudden, violent blizzard while attempting to summit Mount Everest.
A small coastal town is threatened by a monstrous hurricane, forcing residents to fight for their survival.
A family on a safari trip must survive in the wilderness after their vehicle breaks down in a remote game reserve.
A scientist studying a remote rainforest contracts a mysterious, rapidly evolving virus.
A young boy is shipwrecked on a deserted island and must learn to live off the land.
A ship captain becomes obsessed with hunting a massive white whale that destroyed his previous vessel.
A young woman in a dystopian regime is chosen for a televised death match and becomes a symbol of rebellion.
An idealist politician attempts to expose widespread corruption but finds the entire system is allied against them.
A person from a rigid caste system dares to pursue a relationship with someone from a higher, forbidden class.
A brilliant scientist makes a groundbreaking discovery that contradicts the core beliefs of her repressive society.
An artist creates a controversial piece of work that challenges the government's strict censorship laws.
A whistleblower leaks classified documents that reveal their government is illegally spying on its citizens.
A teenager in a conformist town fights for the right to express their individuality through their unique style and ideas.
A computer programmer discovers the artificial intelligence she created has become sentient and has sinister plans for humanity.
A family's new smart home system begins to psychologically terrorize them, turning their sanctuary into a prison.
A detective in a futuristic city must hunt a rogue android that is indistinguishable from a human.
A gamer becomes trapped in a fully immersive virtual reality world and must beat the game to escape.
The last human survivors must battle an army of sentient machines determined to eradicate them.
A spaceship's crew must regain control from their malfunctioning onboard computer during a critical mission.
A Luddite artisan struggles to keep his traditional craft alive in a world increasingly dominated by automation.
A family moves into a new house only to discover it is haunted by a malevolent spirit.
A young wizard must confront a dark lord who is prophesied to be his vanquisher.
A skeptic paranormal investigator's beliefs are shattered when they come face-to-face with a real demonic entity.
A character makes a deal with a demon for fame and fortune but must find a way to break the pact before their soul is claimed.
A town is besieged by vampires, and a small group of residents must fight to survive the night.
An ancient curse is unleashed from a newly discovered tomb, and an archaeologist must stop it before it consumes the world.
A chosen hero is destined to battle ancient gods who are awakening to reclaim the world.
